sentences.sContent: Various windows embellish the corridor, with the shape of square, circle, hexagon and octagon.
sentences.sContent_eng: Various windows embellish the corridor, with the shape of square, circle, hexagon and octagon.
sentences.sCn: 走廊的窗户形状各异，有方形，有圆形，有六角形，也有八角形。

sentences.sContent: Why It's Innovative: A hydraulic system built into the bridge's handrail allows it to retract and curl into an octagon.
sentences.sContent_eng: Why It's Innovative: A hydraulic system built into the bridge's handrail allows it to retract and curl into an octagon.
sentences.sCn: 创新点：这座桥的栏杆使用了液压驱动系统，使之能收缩卷曲成八边形。

sentences.sContent: It includes round, square, octagon, hexagon, and shape wire in coils only for the more commonly used types of stainless steels for general corrosion resistance and high-temperature service.
sentences.sContent_eng: It includes round, square, octagon, hexagon, and shape wire in coils only for the more commonly used types of stainless steels for general corrosion resistance and high-temperature service.
sentences.sCn: 包括只为较常用的一般耐腐蚀和用于高温类型的（截面为）圆形、方形、八角形、六角形等钢丝型材，仅限线圈。

trans.tranOther: a flat shape with eight sides and eight angles
